content: स्थानिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्थानमस्यास्ति रक्ष्यत्वेन इनि] {@--1@} Having a place. {@--2@} Having fixedness, permanent. {@--3@} Having a substitute. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The original form or primitive element, that for which anything else is substituted; स्थानिवदादेशोऽनल्विधौ <ls>P. I. 1. 59.</ls> {@--2@} The form so substituted for anything. {@--3@} That which has a place, or is actually expressed.
